name: Poly Dash
description:
Take a infinite ride through surreal 8-bit world of deadly twists and turns where time is definitely not on your side. You will run faster and faster and the road will become more lethal in every second. Your reflex, concentration and focus will be tested in the way you've never experienced before. You will have to turn and react extremely fast to stay alive. Let's see how far can you get.

* Stunning 3D Graphics
* Addictive and dynamic gameplay
* Easy controls
* Thrilling sound effects
* Infinite world
publishers: SWIFT APPS SP Z O O
